CustomField.description:
Annualized Subscription Fee for this specific product.
Standard Formula (DO NOT EDIT): IF( TEXT(SBQQ__SubscriptionPricing__c) = '', 0, ( SBQQ__NetTotal__c / SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c ) / ( SBQQ__DefaultSubscriptionTerm__c / 12 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Annualized Subscription Fee for this specific product.
CustomField.label: Annual Recurring Revenue
